name: Marron Helps a Friend
description:
~

marron's friend, mugi, has lost the bouquet he needs for the flower dance. 
no need to worry though - marron will help him find it!

~


Marron Helps A Friend is an adventure game made for Friendship Jam. 

play as marron, a young bunny in a small town. join them as they try to help their best friend, mugi, who has lost the bouquet he needs to go to the flower dance today.

play time is ~30 minutes. the game can be played in the browser for pc & smartphone! it can also be played on a gameboy or gameboy emulator if you download the .gb file below.

note: it seems there may be visual/sound issues on edge & safari. another browser such as firefox is recommended. 

the game is free, but if you pay $3 or more, you can support me in my game-making adventures & also receive a digital art collection!

~

CONTROLS:
move - arrow keys or wasd
a - z or alt
b - x or ctrl
start - enter key

~

CREDITS:

story/code/art by npckc
music by sdhizumi
special thanks to rage, vio & armin

~

other things i've worked on can be found here! you can comment right here or on twitter with your thoughts. 

if you like my work and want to support me, you can buy me a coffee or check out my patreon!

~
